section.title: Description
section.p: This class corresponds to a Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) permission. It specifies an information object and action/operation allowed on that object. A permission contains one operation and precisely one information reference.

stentry.p: This attribute is used to specify the unique identifier of the permission.
This association identifies the information resources specified by a permission.
This association identifies the action or operation that is specified by a permission.
